csc171.project03.controller

Class Controller

  • java.lang.Object
    • csc171.project03.controller.Controller
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    KeyEventCallback, TimerCallback

    public class Controller
extends java.lang.Object
implements TimerCallback, KeyEventCallback
    The game controller class. Keeps track of all of the objects that exist in the game at any point and is the communication layer between them and each other and the rest of the view.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private long FPS
      Refresh rate, in frames per second (Hz).

      Tracks whether the game has been started.

      Set that keeps tracked of the currently pressed keys.

      List of Asteroids.

      List of Bombs.

      List of Missiles.
      private SpaceCanvas mSpaceCanvas
      The Canvas that everything is drawn on.
      private Spaceship mSpaceShip
      The Spaceship.
      private java.awt.Image splashImage
      A handle on the splash Image so that it doesn't have to be looked up on every redraw.

      • onKeyPressed

        public void onKeyPressed(KeyPress.VALID_KEYS key)
        Key pressed callback. Adds the passed VALID_KEYS enum item to the keysPressed Set.
        Specified by:
        onKeyPressed in interface KeyEventCallback
        Parameters:
        key - the pressed key.

      • onKeyReleased

        public void onKeyReleased(KeyPress.VALID_KEYS key)
        Key released callback. Removes the VALID_KEYS enum item from the keysPressed Set.
        Specified by:
        onKeyReleased in interface KeyEventCallback
        Parameters:
        key - the released key.
